entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenAPI drops internal ctor #31776
  • GenAPI produces incorrect explicit interface implementations with new keyword #31774

Closed

  • dotnet publish doesn't delete old dlls #16091
  • The framework 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.App', version '3.1.0' was not found. #31770

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #31787
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Split blazor boot extension target for build and publish #31781
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31762
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #31767
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31777
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.0 to 19.12.1 in /eng/dependabot #31682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #31769
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #31759
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #31765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Interactive mode proof of concept #30832
  • Add IsAotCompatible flag to enable all analyzers and IsTrimmable #31766
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Fix incorrect sln add generation #11846
  • Respond to ProduceReferenceAssembly default changing to true #31598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow `dotnet sln list` to display solution folder paths #18502
    Area-CLI
  • Move asset compression to the StaticWebAssets SDK #31559
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Adding locked messages as there is overlocalization in at least 5 of … #31421
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add a JsonSerializerIsReflectionEnabledByDefault property #31626
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bundle Source Link packages #31632
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 8.0.1xx
  • Add `-aot` parameter to the console template #31739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
